items.name: SleepyHollow Wiki
items.title: SleepyHollow Wiki
items.headline: Learn more about the secrets of Sleepy Hollow in the Sleepy Hollow Wiki
items.desc: A former Revolutionary War captain, Ichabod Crane, has somehow come back from the dead to see a small, quiet modern-day town called Sleepy Hollow. As Ichabod wanders about he eventually meets young police lieutenant with a dark past named Abbie Mills whose partner and mentor, Sheriff August Corbin, was murdered. The thing is, the murderer was a Headless rider, the one who Ichabod beheaded on the battlefield 250 years ago. As Ichabod and Abbie wander around trying to understand what has made the Horseman come back from the dead, they discover a shocking secret! The Headless Horseman is the one of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse, Death and that Ichabod's wife Katrina is a witch on the side of light. Now Ichabod and Abbie work together to stop the army of darkness that seeks to begin the end of days and learn shocking revelations of their mysterious demonic foe while finding out dark secrets about this not-so-sleepy town and its inhabitants.

items.name: Sleepy Hollow Wiki
items.title: Sleepy Hollow Wiki
items.headline: Willkommen im Sleepy Hollow Wiki
items.desc: Dieses Wiki beschäftigt sich mit dem Sleepy Hollow-Mythos. Es geht hier vorrangig um die gleichnamige Mystery-Serie, wir beschäftigen uns aber auch mit dem Film und der usrprünglichen Erzählung. Wir freuen uns immer über neue Mystery- und Sleepy Hollow-Fans, die uns bei der Arbeit am Wiki unterstützen wollen und stehen Anfängern gerne mit Rat und Tat zur Seite.
